Price includes shipping first class with tracking.  Of course I will also consider any offers.   




Rhodes PSA 2 - $SOLD
Groom raw - $80
Dubuc raw - $MaKE OFFER   Tough Tough Tough EPDG card
Leifield batting raw - $SOLD
Easterly PSA 2 - $SOLD


Make me an offer.... I will probably drop the prices even more if you buy the lot of them.....
